titles.title: Smart Manufacturing Leadership Act
Smart Manufacturing Leadership Act
Smart Manufacturing Leadership Act
Smart Manufacturing Leadership Act

A bill to improve the productivity and energy efficiency of the manufacturing sector by directing the Secretary of Energy, in coordination with the National Academies and other appropriate Federal agencies, to develop a national smart manufacturing plan and to provide assistance to small- and medium-sized manufacturers in implementing smart manufacturing programs, and for other purposes.
Smart Manufacturing Leadership Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 116-80.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 183.
